item.title: Book update: meme generator chapter in progress
item.description: Been a fun Sunday afternoon working on my chat bots book. Here's a sneak preview. I may demo this section at @southeastruby - come say hi! pic.twitter.com/rrZ9aWIg1i — Daniel Pritchett (@DPritchett) August 13, 2017
